sentence.Network_en: They found their computers producing different results from exactly the same calculation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们发现他们的计算机进行完全相同的计算会得出不同的结果。

sentence.Network_en: The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

sentence.Network_en: The barb stung her exactly the way he hoped it would.
sentence.Network_cn: 如他所愿，这句带刺的话刺痛了她。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... exact a. 精确的；确切的 exactly ad. 精确地；确切地 examine vt. 检查；诊察.
人教版九年级英语单词表_百度文库 ... to one's surprise 令某人惊奇的是…… exactly 正；恰恰 even though 即使.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... exact a. 精确的；确切的 exactly ad. 精确地；确切地 examine vt. 检查；诊察.
高中英语必修1-5词汇表_第二教育网 ... fall in love 相爱；爱上 exactly adv. 确实如此；正是；确切地 disagree vi. 不同意.

list.abs: Not bad. 不错。Not exactly. 不准确。Not now. 不是现在。
不要错过：&gt;口语8000句。。。。。 -... ... Maybe.( 也许吧。) Not exactly.( 不完全同意。) I hope you're right.( 但愿是这样。).
走遍美... ... 24.Study medical 学医 25.Not exactly. 还不一定 28.will be good experience for you. 对你来讲是一次很好的经验.
英语口语8000句12 - 人人听力网(www.rrting.com) ... 他呀，不行。 He won't do. 不完全。 Not exactly. * 可能是吧。 I guess so. *.
2013年高考英... ... B：Not really. 不会吧。 B：Not exactly. 不完全如此。 A：So you missed the meeting. 所以你就错过了这次会议。.
高考高频短语 ... (＝hastily) 匆忙地 (＝exactly alike) 和……完全相同 (＝lacking knowledge) 对……不了解，不知道.

lj.lj_ly: that too was not exactly convincing.
lj.lj_ls: 那也根本不能让人心悦诚服。

jx.jx_en_mean: not quite but close to being

lj.lj_ls: 不说是心急如焚，但有点心神不安。

entry.def: You use exactly before an amount, number, or position to emphasize that it is no more, no less, or no different from what you are stating.

example.ex: Each corner had a guard tower, each of which was exactly ten meters in height...
example.tran: 每个角落都有一座警戒塔，每座警戒塔正好10米高。

example.ex: Agnew's car pulled into the driveway at exactly five o'clock...
example.tran: 阿格纽的车在5点整驶入了车道。

entry.tran: 确实如此/并非如此;正是/不完全是
entry.def: If you say 'Exactly', you are agreeing with someone or emphasizing the truth of what they say. If you say 'Not exactly', you are telling them politely that they are wrong in part of what they are saying.

example.tran: 伊芙几乎赞同地点了点头。“确实如此。”

example.ex: 'We don't know the answer to that.' — 'Exactly — so shut up and stop speculating.'...
example.tran: “我们不知道那个问题的答案。”——“就是——那就闭嘴，别瞎猜。”

entry.def: You use not exactly to indicate that a meaning or situation is slightly different from what people think or expect.

example.ex: He's not exactly homeless, he just hangs out in this park.
example.tran: 确切来说他并不算是无家可归，他只是老在这个公园里转悠。

entry.def: You can use not exactly to show that you mean the opposite of what you are saying.

example.ex: This was not exactly what I wanted to hear...
example.tran: 这根本不是我想听到的。
帆船运动根本就不便宜。

entry.tran: （用于问句中，表示不赞成）到底，具体
entry.def: You use exactly with a question to show that you disapprove of what the person you are talking to is doing or saying.

example.ex: Exactly what are you looking for?

sentences.sentence: "he was doing precisely (or exactly) what she had told him to do"
"it was just as he said--the jewel was gone"

auth_sentence.content: Only the Rockers' aren't exactly meat-and-two-veg greasers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only the Rockers' aren't exactly meat-and-two-veg greasers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only the Rockers' aren't exactly meat-and-two-veg greasers.

auth_sentence.content: But what exactly does a pope's job entail?
auth_sentence.res_content: But what exactly does a pope's job entail?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But what exactly does a pope's job entail?

auth_sentence.content: Not that I can recall exactly what happened next.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not that I can recall exactly what happened next.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not that I can recall exactly what happened next.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地

extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地

Sentence.sentence: What is it we want independence from, exactly?
That's exactly what happened to the subjects who were learning the finger maze
What exactly is it that interests you about the job?
Being funny isn't necessarily an indicator of good social skills and well-being," his research has shown, "it may just exactly be a sign of personality flaws.
The levers and light were set up in exactly the same way except that this time it was only Doris who could see the light indicating which lever to press first.
That's exactly what the Generation O bloggers are hoping to do.

sentences.en: A TV playback showed exactly what had happened.
sentences.cn: 电视播放的录像原样显示了所发生的事。

sentences.en: At the last pip it will be exactly six o’clock.
sentences.cn: 最后的嘟一声正正是六点钟。

means.word_mean: <口>(要求得到更多信息)究竟,到底

sentences.en: Few people knew exactly what the rebels planned to do.
sentences.cn: 没有人知道叛军究竟打算做什么。

sentences.en: He wasn’t exactly pleased to see us—in fact he refused to open the door.
sentences.cn: 他并不是很乐意见到我们─ 他甚至拒绝开门。

sentences.en: It’s not exactly beautiful, is it?

means.word_mean: (用于纠正某人说过的话)并非如此，不完全是这样

sentences.en: ‘So he told you you’d got the job?’ ‘Not exactly, but he said they were impressed with me.’
sentences.cn: “那么他说这个工作归你了？”“不完全是这样，但是他说他们对我的印象不错。”
